name: Spicy Beef Bulgogi
author: Joel Sticha
summary: My extra-spicy version of Beef Bulgogi that I learned from a woman in France. Serve over rice or noodles.
ingredients: 1 teaspoon ground cayenne pepper, or to taste
directions: Place flank steak slices in a shallow dish
Mix soy sauce, sriracha sauce, green onion, sugar, whole dried peppers, garlic, sesame seeds, sesame oil, ground cayenne, and black pepper together in a bowl
Cover with plastic wrap and refrigerate to marinate, at least 1 hour but preferably overnight
Preheat an outdoor grill for high heat, and lightly oil the grate
Remove steak slices from marinade and grill on preheated grill until slightly charred and cooked through, 1 to 2 minutes per side
Simmer marinade in a wok or skillet over medium heat until thick and the consistency of gravy; pour over grilled steak
